body_content.explanation: a back leg of an animal with four legs and the part of the back near its tail:
examples: She patted the horse's glossy black haunch.
Meerkats have the charming habit of sitting up on their haunches and basking in the early morning sun.

body_content.explanation: a piece of meat consisting of an animal's back leg and part of the back near the tail:
balanced in a position with your feet on the ground, your legs bent and your bottom close to the ground:
examples: She was sitting on her haunches.
The soldier squatted on his haunches, cradling a rifle.
He crouched on his haunches and looked carefully at the animal tracks.
